page.title: 13RELIGION
page.content: Billingborough has an Anglican Church and a Methodist Chapel.Horbling has an Anglican Church. Members of other denominations have to go to the nearest towns. Billingborough Methodist Chapel runs the Sunday School which children from both denominations attend. Church festivals are celebrated in the village Churches at different times of day because the Vicar has the charge of three congregations and Sempringham Abbey. Family services are held once a month when members of the congregation take a greater part than usual in the service.
